client_description.Summary Note:
The RM met Anaïs Peeters at a yacht party in Brussels. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Anaïs Peeters is a 24 year old and comes from Belgium.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
client_description.Family Background: Anaïs Peeters is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description.Education Background:
Anaïs finished secondary school at Lycée Molière in 2020.
In 2024, Anaïs graduated from Vesalius College with a degree.
client_description.Occupation History:
Anaïs Peeters is a 24 year old and comes from Belgium.
Anaïs Peeters did not start her professional career yet.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
She did not manage to save any money during her career.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Tech Entrepreneur, she received an inheritance of 2190000 EUR in 2016, which she has used to secure her financial future.
client_description.Client Summary: The RM is committed to helping Anaïs achieve financial success and security as she embarks on her professional journey.
